name: OriumSubgraph
author: orium.network
description: A set of subgraphs (one for each network) for Orium Network dapps

scripts.codegen-matic: cp addresses-matic.ts src/utils/addresses.ts && cp subgraph-matic.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen subgraph-matic.yaml
scripts.codegen-mumbai: cp addresses-mumbai.ts src/utils/addresses.ts && cp subgraph-mumbai.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen subgraph-mumbai.yaml
scripts.codegen-goerli: cp addresses-goerli.ts src/utils/addresses.ts && cp subgraph-goerli.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen subgraph-goerli.yaml
scripts.test-mumbai: cp subgraph-mumbai.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph test mumbai
scripts.test-matic: cp subgraph-matic.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph test matic
